channel.title: Tyreatta-Scape Oldschool
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VvOi1Ho.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]A bit of info[/b][/size][/center]
Tyreatta-Scape was originally started by me, the original base was deathlypvpz V4. After hosting for a while i noticed that the server was quite buggy and had a few dupes. I eventually ceased hosting. I later found a base that i would be using next which was Fridderscape. I have been working on this for quite a while now and have decided to take production further.
[center][b][size=18pt]Current Server Features[/size][/b][/center]
[ul][li]Home at edgeville[/li] [li]PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc.[/li] [li]Spirit Shields [/li][li]Most special attacks work correctly, including dragon claws, godswords, vls, whip[/li] [li]Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials[/li] [li]Korasi's Sword with working special attack[/li] [li]Working ring of wealth.[/li] [li]Auto-Join Clan Chat on login[/li] [li]Easy Barrows System[/li] [li]Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed[/li] [li]Re-Written buyItem Method, no lag caused by buying items[/li] [li]Working Overloads[/li] [li]Pk Point Shops[/li] [li]Added most NPC spawns to the base[/li] [li]Good Starter Items[/li] [li]Working mystery boxes[/li] [li]Extra Raredrop table[/li] [li]Auto Cache Downloader[/li] [li]Staff Login Messages[/li] [li]Custom Quest Tab[/li] [li]Server guide @ Home[/li] [li]Auto-Voting and Vote Points[/li] [li]Good XP rates[/li] [li]Decent drop rates[/li] [li]Shared Points System between slayer and pking.[/li] [li]Ability to bank all items[/li] [li]A friendly owner :)[/li] [li]Working Minigames[/li] [li]Working Bosses[/li] [li]Working Turmoil[/li][/ul]
[center][size=18pt][b]Server Pictures[/b][/size][/center] [spoiler=Server Pics][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ivbr07.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/339hnq8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/29omzcl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/onyfs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2medde.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2z68rys.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/23kdnhv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2qdtldu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/o69zz8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/11boi2o.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2pyuzj5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/345eq9f.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[size=18pt]Download .Jar Client[/size] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20957550/Client.jar][size=18pt]Here[/size][/url]
[url=http://tyreattascape.createaforum.com/index.php][size=18pt]Forums! Click here.[/size][/url]

Tyreatta-Scape was originally started by me, the original base was deathlypvpz V4. After hosting for a while i noticed that the server was quite buggy and had a few dupes.
